reviews.text:
Extremely Disappointing Experience and Lack of Accountability:
On October 24th my husband and I had an unfortunate incident at this restaurant. Our server accidentally dropped a plate with three different dressings, which splattered all over us - our clothes, shoes, my scarf, and my bag. Accidents happen, and we were initially understanding. The server apologized and said the restaurant would reimburse the cost of our dinner, but that promise was never fulfilled.
The next day, I went back to speak with the manager, but was told he wasn‚Äôt there. I left my phone number and was told he would call me later. A few hours later, the hostess called to say that the manager was unwell and would return on Wednesday,  but I never received a call. I sent three emails directly to the manager with no response. I also contacted the restaurant‚Äôs general email address, and while someone replied saying the owner was overseas and would get back to me, I never heard back despite sending three follow-up emails.
This was a severe incident that caused significant inconvenience and damage, my brand-new shirt was completely ruined, and we had to take several items to the dry cleaners. We even had to cancel our evening plans and return to our hotel to change.
What‚Äôs most disappointing is not the accident itself, but the complete lack of responsibility and communication afterward. I expected at least a sincere apology or some follow-up from management, but received neither.
I truly hope the restaurant takes this feedback seriously and improves its approach to customer care and accountability.

I love this neighborhood gem! I‚Äôve been here multiple times and it is always amazing. Brunch with girlfriends, a cocktail on a weeknight with my fianc√©e, Friday night when they have a DJ, or taking my parents out to dinner - Panzon is perfect for every occasion! The staff is so friendly and very attentive. The Panzon cocktail is sooo delicious, and I‚Äôve tried nearly every food item on the menu. The sticky wings are hands down the best, tuna tostada and mushroom quesadilla are two of my other favorites, but you really can‚Äôt go wrong!! Can‚Äôt wait to go back soon!

New Review 11/2/2025
We hosted our Welcome Party at Panzon and it was amazing!!! The planning process was incredibly easy and they were such easy people to work. We opted to have an open bar and it did not disappoint! The staff was incredible and the service was so fast. We did platters of different tacos, chips and guac, and mini tuna tostadas. The tuna tostadas were so delicious and a crowd favorite! We bought out the whole restaurant and our guests loved mingling in the space but also spreading into the backyard for some breathing room. We wanted to have a few speeches and the owners were so kind as to buy a microphone that would hook into their sound system. Everyone went above and beyond and next thing you know, our guests made a dance floor! 100/10 would recommend for an event, or even just dinner in Greenpoint! Love this place so much and can‚Äôt wait to go back soon!
Absolutely Disgusting, and terrible service. Steer clear. Save your money

Threw a 15 person birthday dinner/engagement party here and it was AMAZING. Daya spent weeks planning the set menu with me, printed a special version, let me bring some flowers‚Äîand it went so well! Food was amazing, service was phenomenal, and drinks were delicious. It was such a happy memory I will cherish forever.

Omg the lovely caramel fit bartender who‚Äôs name i reluctantly forgot to get was incredible. He made the most remarkable mezcal margarita during happy hour, he was super knowledgeable and not to mention easy on the eyes. Please make  stop here if u want to be adorned in mezcal (and or tequila). ‚ù§Ô∏è
Such a great and vibe spot! Chicken wings was phenomenal, bartender Mario was so professional
Mario is an amazing bartender and the food was phenomenal. I think the best taco I have had so far in life.
Mario is a great bartender!  And the carnitas gorditas are amazing!
Mario was an amazing bartender and the food is soooo good!
Awesome vibe, great service.  Beautiful outdoor seating in the front and back courtyard.   Wonderful cocktails and food
I‚Äôve had the best avocado margherita ever
Love the staff
Love this place & love everyone who works here
Panzon is such a gem in greenpoint. Incredible cocktails and food, the vibes are everything you‚Äôd want. Love having drinks outside on the patio. 10/10 recommend
I want to thank my waitress Ellis for such a lovely experience, just wonderful

Panz√≥n is an absolutely wonderful restaurant that‚Äôs in a beautiful location in Greenpoint. Excellent service and atmosphere. Particularly suggest the burrito and mezcal margarita - but the truth is that every single thing is perfect.
The food was incredible as were all the speciality mezcal cocktails. Don‚Äôt miss out if you‚Äôre in Greenpoint! Our server Janyce was truly awesome!
Mario‚Äôs the man! Great place

El 15 de September d√≠a de la independencia de Mexico üá≤üáΩ fue incre√≠ble todo el personal super amable los tacos estaban increibles  , las bebidas todo todoooooo fue genial!!!!üòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄ
We had our wedding dinner at Panzon-- and it rocked! Could not be happier with how it turned out.‚Ä¶
Amazing food and great service.. the sticky wings are a must try
So yummy!
Excelente lugar y excelentes cocktails!
Delicious food and amazing service! Come here! Locally owned! Panzon Mezcal drink was out of this world and the host/our waitress was the sweetest woman ever.
Super friendly
Nice backyard
Love this place! Best happy hour around!
Good food- subpar service.

Super üëçüèΩ the place to be.
Near the manhattan view‚Ä¶ on the pier.
Love tequila
Love the service
Love guacamole
ü•ë
Love the corn‚Ä¶
Best happy hour in Brooklyn!
Vibe is great! Decor is artistic and thoughtful. Food is filling and flavorful. The staff rocks- I had Lily and Cody who were AMAZING!
Good service

The good: really nice place, a great patio and good decoration. Service was also very attentive
The bad: the food was not worth the price. The ‚Äútorta de milanesa‚Äù is not a torta, is a burger (brioche buns). The tacos are small, 2 bite tacos and the pancakes were not flavorful. Every dish my party got felt lacking
Expensive for what it is. Better Mexican food can be found elsewhere for less.
Good food - a little bit overpriced but really solid. Giving 2 stars because they have some seats that you will get wet in sitting in because they won‚Äôt fix the dripping from the ceiling.
Amazing
Amazing
üëåü´∞‚Ä¶
Wonderful cocktails and great service - would recommend for everyone wanting delicious food and a fun time!
Incredible service, incredible food, and great outdoor patio area
Great service and great food + drinks - exactly what I wanted. Would def recommend and come back!
A nice calming environment with an easy to understand menu with options everyone will love! The candles are a nice touch.
very fun! waitress was nice :D

Chill vibes and delicious Mexican food‚ù§Ô∏è
I recommend baja tacos

Food was good overall just really expensive for what it was. Portions are pretty small. I think it was $60 per person in my group for just good Mexican food. Wouldn‚Äôt be upset going back, but wouldn‚Äôt go out of my way to.
Some of the best Mexican in the city!

It‚Äôs a cute place. Music was a little loud. Hard to have a casual conversation at times. The guac and salsa were good. Small portions though. Ceviche had a good flavor. The birria was really bland. Not sure I would come here again tbh.

I got the Taco Birria and it literally tasted like nothing no flavor at all!!! And definitely overpriced. Got better tacos and from my neighborhood food truck , dont waste your money. Also the pitcher is ridiculous, really small and very hard to pour without spilling.

Food really not it here. The tacos are expensive and mid compared to other great spots in the neighborhood. Chicken tacos had fat in them and were overly spicy. We ordered guac and the avocados were definitely old, had a rancid smell.  The salsa were inedible they were so spicy. Good for drinks. Recommend Oxomoco, Taco Ramirez, and even much more casual Vamos Al Tequila for better Mexican food.
Fun!

I had a great time eating here. The food is delicious and the staff is lovely, the waitress called Lily was very friendly. I got a started and a main for $47 and for the quality of the food it was great value. The tuna tostada were amazing and so were the beef tacos! I highly recommend.

Panzon is becoming a neighbourhood staple. Fantastic drinks, delicious food, great music and a gorgeous back patio. My favourite drink is the Panzon, a creamy avocado tequila drink and I always order the tuna tostada and the torta sandwich!

You want Mexican food that is like Oxomoco without the prices? You want good seafood options without waiting hours like Mariscos? Enter Panzon.

We got the cerviche which was delicious. Do not skip the corn (esquite)! It‚Äôs cut in handheld pieces so it can be messy but it is so delicious.

I had the gorditas which was a special. The pork was delicious. My lady loved the blue crab tacos.

Don‚Äôt skip the tres leches cakes. Great food. Great service. Shout out to Claire, our stellar server.

Loved it here! Stumbled in from out of town and it was the perfect spot for dinner and drinks to catch up w a friend! Cocktail selection was unique which I loved. I had a hard time choosing but the bartender suggested the signature tequila avocado drink and I was so pleasantly surprised!  For dinner we got the civiche starter and birria tacos‚Ä¶ so good. I want to come back in the summer when the back patio is open! Menu is also labeled gf and vegetarian so it fit my dietary restrictions (gf and dairy free) üëå

We stumbled in here on a rainy Saturday when we wanted to try somewhere new and we were not disappointed! The bartender and the hostess/server were friendly and the food was incredible. We got the potato flautas and I was amazed how much flavor they packed into the fried potato goodness! Their salsa verde is spicy in the nicest way and the burrito was delicately rich.

Along with the food we tried a few of the cocktails. The espresso martini was slightly too floral for me but the gin martini and the panzon margarita were so bright and refreshing I can‚Äôt wait to have them again!

They also have blackbird iykyk;)

Me and my family of 5 went because my dad is friends with the chef and the food was so so delicious. It can get noisy but that‚Äôs the only complaint. The picture frames in the bathroom are a mood. I ordered birria tacos.

Drinks are pretty good. Food is okay. Service was not great. They took our plate away while we were still working on our food, and it was the only dish on the table at that time üòÇ.
This place also seems to be lack of sound absorbing material, which makes it very loud. They also kept both front door and back door open all the time‚ÄîI‚Äôd not go on a bad air quality day again

On Greenpoint Ave, you‚Äôll find new  restaurant after new restaurant. Panz√≥n serves up quality Mexican in a narrow bar space. We grabbed two seats at the bar which was quite packed and it took a bit longer than you might expect to put in a drink order and same for food.
We ordered the fish tacos (packed with flavorful toppings & a spicy crema sauce), the short rib special (very tasty) and the enchiladas (lacking flavor).
Overall, it was a quality Friday dinner.
*The live DJ on Friday night was a nice touch

Nice place for a good drink and a quick snack. They have a nice patio but avoid a rainy day (could be partially covered as technically possible). The food prices are a bit high for the portion size but the food is very tasty. Very nice and fast service. I recommend!

Great food, great vibes. Backyard area is perfect for a summer evening out. Our favorites were the fish and chicken tacos, corn ribs and the El Panzon cocktail. A little pricey but definitely worth the visit.

The first time I heard about this place was when I saw their huge sign while driving. My friends and I decided to give it a try and enjoy the food. Since they were running late (or maybe I just arrived too early!), I ended up sitting at the bar and ordered a happy hour margarita with chamoy and Taj√≠n on the rim. For $20, it included chips and guac or salsa‚Äînot bad at all. The margarita was delicious, and the chips were fresh.

Once my friends arrived, we ordered a few dishes to share: the enchiladas, tacos a la barbacoa, and tres leches cake. Everything was good, though the food itself wasn‚Äôt something we‚Äôd rave about, but we definitely enjoyed the overall vibe. I do want to mention that the staff was fantastic‚Äîfriendly, welcoming, and knowledgeable.

This place is a gem! Located in one of my favorite areas to visit in greenpoint. Panzons atmosphere is amazing even on a rainy day. I had to opportunity to try the new brunch menu. What a treat! Do not skip the Chilaquiles, so much flavor. The pollo torta was unique and tasty. Make sure you get the tres leches French toast for the table. Can‚Äôt wait to come back to try the tuna tostada and ceviche!
Great bartender over memorial day weekend! Food was great and the outside back ambiance is so pleasant. The spicy salsa is HOT but very good. Will definitely come back!

Cool spot with excellent Mexico City-inspired eats. Highly recommend the frizzled onions con chapulines, guacamole, rings tacos and El Panz√≥n cocktail. Our server Nick was so fun and provided great service. This spot will be a part of our regular Greenpoint rotation!

Highly recommend!!! Really fun, laid back atmosphere with a carefully curated drinks/food menu. Staff is super friendly so this has become our go to spot. They also have a stunning backyard which is so fun for the summer and fall!!! We even held our friends engagement party there and the staff was so attentive and accommodating. Highly recommend the avo marg, ceviche, tuna tostada, tinga tacos. You won't regret !!

Panz√≥n is a place with an atmosphere that makes you feel at home and chef Fredy is a genius in the kitchen.  Every dish is made perfectly, you can‚Äôt  go wrong with anything you order and it is a great place to bring your date.

Food and service were great! We went on a Saturday night and didn‚Äôt know reservations were recommended so we were seated at the bar. Though it was busy, the bartender was very friendly. I had the panz√≥n cocktail which was so smooth and delicious! Highly recommend the chorizo gorditas and the tinga tacos.

Panz√≥n is pretty much the most perfectly engineered woo girl spot? And I‚Äôm not saying this in a desparaging way. Tacos. Margs. Outdoor patio with beach vibes. Tuna tostadas packed with lip smacking acidity and richness. Savory taj√≠n blasted chicharrones shaped like sand dollars. Dismantled bloomin fried onion shreds with some kind of southwestern ranch thing from the gods. Perhaps the best menu offering is the ‚Äúyour way‚Äù Margarita. Want to customize your margarita like your Starbucks bev? Of course you do. I prefer spicy mezcal with salt.

This may all sound like a hipster dishing out shade - but it‚Äôs not. I‚Äôm not complaining in the slightest. I love this spot. It‚Äôs tough to find a spot that your vanilla Frappuccino friends AND your foodie friends can both rave about. But this is it. There‚Äôs something for everyone.

Mexican restaurant with good food and drinks. I liked they have good tequila and mezcal, specially that it wasn‚Äôt just off the shelf mezcal.

I think, for Mexican food, some things were too pricy. Esquites are tasty but there is no way they are so expensive, it‚Äôs street food !

Beware with the torta de chilaquiles, it‚Äôs huge. Perfect food for hangovers.

What a spot! Food selection is on point, huge list of mezcal and beautiful wines, there is something for everyone. Owners are super friendly, they brought out some little desserts on the house for our 1 year old (which he loved). Great vibe! Definitely will be returning frequently.

Don't get the aguachile. It's supposed to be spicy and plentiful, it was weak and small.
Don't get the wings. The tamarind overpowered any other flavors it had in it..
My bf enjoyed the chicken sandwich.
The drinks were good.
I forgot to take pictures of anything, but what I ordered was meh...
He got the 3 leches, he liked it. So.. drinks & dessert i guess

Panz√≥n is all around amazing ‚Äì¬†I travel in Mexico frequently and they're serving up some of the best Mexican food I've had in the states. Their menu is always evolving to incorporate new things which is great, and the majority of items are gluten friendly. Specific things I love: the avocado marg is one of the tastiest drinks I've ever had (sounds weird BUT IT ISN'T), the tuna tostada is straight out of CDMX, the enchiladas rival Casa Enrique, and the gorditas are unspeakably good. I would be remiss if I didn't mention how legit the entire staff is ‚Äì¬†every single person working here is kind, cool, and skilled. DO NOT SLEEP ON THIS SPOT, if you haven't already been here you're doing yourself a disservice.

We had the most wonderful experience at Panzon!  The food, hospitality and vibes were off the charts.  The El Panzon margarita is worth the stop alone but each and every dish is crafted beautifully.  Shout outs to the esquites, crab tostada and mushroom quesadilla, and extra special shout out to the skin-contact wines, which were the best I‚Äôve had.  I wish I took more pictures of this incredible meal.  Cant wait to come back!

Good and drinks were excellent. A wonderful and welcomed additional to the neighborhood. Corn ribs, tostada and tacos were amazing. Bathroom had a cool vibe. Excited to see how they use the outdoor space in the warmer months.
Such a fun vibe! Our server Lily was so great and really made the dinner special. I everything is a tad spicy but that‚Äôs just me!

Came in after work and had some delicious vegan tacos at the bar w their namesake marg. The bartender Jay was so personable and made a great* few* panzons for me! Also LOVED the Guac, it had a little kick to it and was super fresh 10/10
Great atmosphere on any given night, the carnitas and everything is amazing. The chef and staff are very friendly and they have the best specials
This place is so good. The food is delicious. It has really good vibes! Dolores was so nice. She went above and beyond for us to enjoy our time!

Amazing food! You can tell that every dish is prepared with the utmost care, and the service is wonderful. Neha is an excellent server and goes the extra mile to make sure your dining experience is more than satisfactory! Plus the mascot is adorable <3

The cocktails are insane! The wine list is chef‚Äôs kiss. Come hungry - the Chilaquiles Torta changed my life and the guac is arguably the best I have ever had. Is Greenpoint Ave the new burger hop block!? Chilaquiles Torta to the 21 GP smash burger!?

I‚Äôve been to Panz√≥n 3 times now and every time gets better. The food and drinks are delicious and the service is phenomenal. It‚Äôs such a fun environment and the music is always so good. Pascal our bartender was super attentive and suggested really great food. Will be back a million times!
